name: Special Topics in Health
description: The topics presented in this course will represent a range of contemporary issues in health research. Topics will vary by instructor and term.
department: Interdisciplinary Centre for Health and Society (UTSC)
prerequisites: Completion of at least 2.0 credits at the C-Level in HLT courses from the requirements of the Major/Major Co-op programs in Health Studies; and a minimum CGPA of 2.5.
